property.name: createWigFileQuery
property.value: INSERT INTO catgenome.bed_graph ( bed_graph_id, bio_data_item_id, reference_genome_id) VALUES ( :BED_GRAPH_ID, :BIO_DATA_ITEM_ID, :REFERENCE_GENOME_ID)

property.name: loadWigFileQuery
property.value:
SELECT b.bio_data_item_id, b.name, b.type, b.path, b.format, b.created_by, b.created_date, b.bucket_id, b.pretty_name, bg.bed_graph_id, bg.reference_genome_id as bed_graph_reference_genome_id,
null as index_id, null as index_name, null as index_type, null as index_path, null as index_format, null as index_bucket_id, null as index_created_by, null as index_created_date FROM catgenome.bed_graph bg JOIN catgenome.biological_data_item b ON bg.bio_data_item_id = b.bio_data_item_id WHERE bg.bed_graph_id = ?

property.name: loadWigFilesByReferenceIdQuery
property.value:
SELECT b.bio_data_item_id, b.name, b.type, b.path, b.format, b.created_by, b.created_date, b.bucket_id, b.pretty_name, bg.bed_graph_id, bg.reference_genome_id as bed_graph_reference_genome_id,
null as index_id, null as index_name, null as index_type, null as index_path, null as index_format, null as index_bucket_id, null as index_created_by, null as index_created_date FROM catgenome.bed_graph bg JOIN catgenome.biological_data_item b ON bg.bio_data_item_id = b.bio_data_item_id WHERE bg.reference_genome_id = ?
